post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Junior Graphic Designer
About the Job
                  Junior Graphic Designer


ACI Brands Inc., is one of Canada's largest Fashion Accessory Companies. Located in Oakville at the Mississauga border, our dynamic company has an exciting opportunity for a Junior Graphic Designer in our Creative Department. We are looking for someone who is creative, productive and energetic.

Qualified candidates will have the following:



Degree or Diploma in Graphic Design
1 to 3 years of related work experience
Working knowledge of pre-press and print production
Ability to see job through from concept to completion
Ability to carry out projects in a team environment or individually
Proficiency in all Adobe design programs on a Macintosh platform
Possess strong typography and layout abilities
Strong written, verbal and organizational skills
Packaging design & experience with 3-D mock-ups would be an asset
Experience in photography is an asset
post.title: Jr.Graphic Designer
